knimeNode.name: Column To XML
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create an XML column from input data.

fullDescription.intro: Does a row wise conversion of input data to XML. The created XML cells consist of a single XML element with custom name, content and attributes.
fullDescription.option: Name of the new column in the output table.
Data bound content of the XML element. A column with XML or string data can be chose here. In the latter case XML special characters are automatically escaped in order to get valid XML.
Name of the created XML element. A custom name will be equal for every row whereas data bound name takes its value from an input column.
Attributes added to the XML element with data bound values can be defined here.
Attributes added to the XML element can be defined here.
Check when the source columns should not show up in the output table. Source columns are the content column and the columns used for the data bound name and the data bound attributes.

ports.outPort: The input table with additional column containing the XML.
